DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Test Result Study Participant Recollect Or Laboratory Report Basis Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not a laboratory test result is based on study participant recollection or laboratory report.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Test Result Study Participant Recollect Or Laboratory Report Basis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The outcome of a laboratory test._Any individiual that has a role in a study, including study personnel and study subjects._The act of recalling information by mental effort._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products._A short textual account; having provided a short account._The fundamental assumptions underlying an explanation or a relation that provide the foundation for something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The outcome of a laboratory test.

Concepts.definition: The outcome of a laboratory test.

Property.preferredName: Study Participant Recollect Or Laboratory Report Basis
Property.preferredDefinition: Any individiual that has a role in a study, including study personnel and study subjects.:The act of recalling information by mental effort.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products.:A short textual account; having provided a short account.:The fundamental assumptions underlying an explanation or a relation that provide the foundation for something.

Concepts.definition: Any individiual that has a role in a study, including study personnel and study subjects.
The act of recalling information by mental effort.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
A facility equipped and competent to conduct scientific experiments, observations, tests, investigations, and/or to manufacture chemicals or medical products.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.
The fundamental assumptions underlying an explanation or a relation that provide the foundation for something.
